What_We_Know__c:
+++++
2025_0320: Meeting Results
+++++

1) Today we met and navigated to your Databases > Settings > Connection and applied the correct profile in order to use the "GLEANERLIFEsvc_stealthbits" service profile and "Set all the child objects to inherit these settings".

2) We observed that 3 Host Management > User Host lists consisting of SQL Server endpoints should probably/possibly be configured under your Database > Settings > Host Lists Assignment.  But no one has approached you in regards to your NEA > Databases job group and you are not going to configure this job at this time.
Solution_Comment__c:
1) Please confirm that you can access this article and read the article first and observe the screenshots.

Please proceed very carefully while following this article:
Update Service Account Password Upon Password Change in Active Directory (AD)

https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/z-kb-articles-salesforce/page/kA04u0000000IKbCAM.html

+++++
2025_0320: Meeting Results
+++++

1) Today we met and navigated to your Databases > Settings > Connection and applied the correct profile in order to use the "GLEANERLIFEsvc_stealthbits" service profile and "Set all the child objects to inherit these settings".

2) We observed that 3 Host Management > User Host lists consisting of SQL Server endpoints should probably/possibly be configured under your Database > Settings > Host Lists Assignment.  But no one has approached you in regards to your NEA > Databases job group and you are not going to configure this job at this time.
